name: Kings League Head Soccer
storyline:
Addictive gameplay: Control kings and queens in fast-paced head-to-head soccer matches.
Diverse characters: Unlock the most powerful kings and queens, each with unique special abilities.
Upgrades and power-ups: Improve your skills and unlock power-ups to dominate the playing field.
Enchanting graphics: Immerse yourself in a visually captivating world with vibrant settings and characters.
Get ready for exciting, action-packed competition in Kings League Head Soccer!
summary: Compete in the epic Kings League Head Soccer! Immerse yourself in a unique and exciting arcade soccer experience, where you can control the most prominent kings and queens in head-to-head matches. Prove your skill and strategy in this addictive soccer game, while unlocking characters, upgrading your skills and climbing the leaderboard.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: ¡Descubre la épica aventura de Kings League Head Soccer! | Tráiler del emocionante juego de móvil
